thread.section_title: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Skipper (formerly Jetaport) | hiskipper.com
thread.title: Luke R
thread.title_full: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) reviewed by Luke R

author: Luke R
title: Luke R
text: We were able to come up with some good hotel blocks through this website. While they were, for the most part, very helpful, there were a couple times where the hotel bookings were not for the correct dates (twice in a row), and we had to follow up several times for them to get the final contract executed. Overall helpful, but not turn-key, and needed some reminding and following up on our part to get it completed.
